content: the left turn row 4 ch1 double_crochet in next double_crochet to end 16 times ch1 slipstitch to last single_crochet on the right fasten_off other arch reattach yarn and repeat row 1-4 as above but do not fasten_off turn row 5 the edging ch4 counts as single_crochet ch3 single_crochet in first chain space skip next double_crochet single_crochet in next chain space ch3 single_crochet in same chain space until you reach the end of the arch then single_crochet to the edge of the single_crochet row before the filet mesh starts continue to single_crochet in next mesh space ch3 single_crochet in same mesh space until you reach the beginning of the other arch then single_crochet to the edge of the single_crochet row before the arch continue around the arch and up the other side in the same pattern when you reach the start single_crochet to the single_crochet row as before fasten_off finishing weave in all ends depending on your yarn you may want to block this scarf to square up the design in that case get it wet and lay it flat using your fingers to move it into shape let dry and enjoy symbol crochet for scarf border and edging chain slipstitch single_crochet double_crochet note for the first arch fasten_off after the slipstitch at the star start end © proper trappings 2007
